alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 12:19PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Collier and central Hendry Counties through 115 PM EST... At 1218 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a funnel cloud along a line extending from Villas to 18 miles southwest of Lovers Key State Park to 46 miles southwest of St. James City. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naples, Marco Island, Ave Maria, Golden Gate Estates, Immokalee, Cape Romano, Belle Meade, Orangetree, Golden Gate, East Naples, Lely Resort, Big Corkscrew Island, Vineyards, Royal Palm Hammock, Naples Park, Marco Island Airport, Naples Manor, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, North Naples and Pelican Bay. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Collier County
